alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cheboygan and Otsego Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Reasoners Corner to near Waters. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indian River, Vanderbilt, Wolverine, Burt Lake State Park, Sparr and Chester Township around 120 PM EDT. Eastern Corwith Township, Pickerel Lake and Johannesburg around 125 PM EDT. Koehler Township and Afton around 135 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
